title: Customized Windows XP SP3 Final All Languages intact. Fully Upda
description:
I originally created this for Demonoid, Thought it would share it with TPB Users.

Windows XP Professional Service Pack 3, All Languages in tact.

Passes FULL WGA, No need for cracks.

Whats been done.

Briefcase
Internet Games
Pinball

;# Hardware Support #

Gravis Digital GamePort
Multi-port serial adapters
